    # Helper Classes

    # UI fonts:

    ForClasses
    UI font... lf-sans-ui
    and weight: 100 lf-sans-ui lf-ulight
    and weight: 200 lf-sans-ui lf-xlight
    and weight: 300 lf-sans-ui lf-light
    and weight: 400 lf-sans-ui lf-regular
    and weight: 500 lf-sans-ui lf-medium
    and weight: 600 lf-sans-ui lf-sbold
    and weight: 700 lf-sans-ui lf-bold
    and weight: 800 lf-sans-ui lf-xbold
    and weight: 900 lf-sans-ui lf-ubold

    Example:

    <a href="#" class="your-button-class lf-sans-ui lf-medium" lang="Mlym">സ്ക്രിപ്റ്റ് — Malayalam</a>

    Renders as:

    സ്ക്രിപ്റ്റ് — Malayalam

    Add your webfont rules, make sure your static and variable fonts have the same 'font-family' name and that the static fallback is first:

    ← Variable Fonts Variables →
